am enclosing herewith

properties.sfomuseum:description: Excerpt of correspondence from War Department, Headquarters Ninth Corps Area, Office of the Air Officer, Presidio of San Francisco, titled “Excerpt from 1st Lieut. H. A. Moore’s letter,” October 6, 1925, concerning existing conditions of potential airport site; typewritten page.
